name: DigitalHome
0:
”Alexa, open front door”
”Alexa, unlock front door”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The Digitalhome app allows users to manage their Digitalhome smart locks. With this Alexa skill, you can easily issue commands to Alexa to unlock and lock your Digitalhome Smart locks. For now this skill only allows Alexa Voice controls to Digitalhome smart locks that are directly owned or paired by the user's accounts. Also make sure that the Remote Unlock is enabled in the lock settings using our Digitalhome app in order for this skill to properly work.
